workshoptitle: Analyze, Query, and Visualize Property Graphs with Oracle Database

tutorials.description: Register for a Free Tier account

tutorials.description: Setup an Always Free autonomous database instance

tutorials.description: Deploy the Graph Server & Client Marketplace image

tutorials.description: Create and populate tables with the Customer 360 dataset

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Graph Query and Analysis with JShell
tutorials.description: Graph Query and Analysis with JShell on the Free Tier compute
